author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: A once-in-a-while treat, this is the ultimate ham and cheese toastie - try it and see.
name: Tasty Croquemadame Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 slices thick slices of goodquality ham

recipeInstructions.text: Butter each slice of bread on both sides. Set aside 50g of the cheese. Make sandwiches by spreading 4 slices of bread with a little mustard, (if using), then a layer of grated cheese, firmly pressed down. Season well, then add a piece of ham, another layer of cheese, and a second piece of bread.

Melt the 2 tbs of butter in a large, nonstick frying pan and fry 2 sandwiches carefully over a medium heat for 2-3 minutes each side, pressing them gently with a spatula, until golden brown. Keep warm while you fry the remaining 2 sandwiches. Wipe the pan with kitchen paper.
Preheat the grill on its highest setting. Place the fried sandwiches on a baking sheet and top each with onequarter of the reserved grated cheese. Grill until the cheese has melted and is bubbling.
Meanwhile, heat the sunflower oil in the frying pan and fry the eggs how you like them. Top each sandwich with a fried egg and serve with a pile of shoestring fries.
